Offering_dept: Bachelor Program of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science
Competency_indicators: 1.運用數學、物理、科學及電機資訊領域之能力。
Course_content:
▪ Systems of Linear Equations and Matrices (Chapter 1)
▪ Determinants (Chapter 2)
▪ General Vector Spaces (Chapter 4)
▪ Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors (Chapter 5)
▪ Inner Product Spaces (Chapter 6)
▪ Diagonalization and Quadratic Forms (Chapter 7)
▪ General Linear Transformation (Chapter 8)
Evaluation: Class attendance 10%, quizzes 30% midterm 30%, and final 30%.
Textbook:
Primary Textbook:
H. Anton & C. Rorres, Elementary Linear Algebra: Applications Version (12th edition), Wiley, 2021.

References:
G. Strang, Introduction to Linear Algebra (4th edition), Cambridge Press, 2019.
W. K. Nicholson, Elementary Linear Algebra (2nd edition), McGraw-Hill, 2004.
S. H. Friedberg, A. J. Insel, and L. E. Spence, Linear Algebra (4th edition), Prentice Hall, 2003.
